workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.16403452312610184 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.1509625264746996 --weight-decay 1.9663298891508973e-05 --lr 0.00039993944518662035 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 99249 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.0650859756732183 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
